divs: Sighting DetailsI was 12 than, I was walking home from school when I noticed a light in the sky. It looked like nothing I've seen before. It was an isocilies triangle and was spinning as if rolling, 1 light on each point, and it was reddish black. There were lights all over the middle and was going at least 1,000 mph, and as quickly as it came, it vanished beyond the horizon, not making a SINGEL sound. Throught the experience and after I was shocked and very confuesed. Most of it is black, and I got home at 11 o' clock.
Summary: I was walking home when I saw a light
